mapper.select: select * from booknotes where pub_priv=0 order by upload_date desc
select * from booknotes where isbn = #{isbn} and pub_priv=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booknotes (member_num, member_name, member_photo, isbn, b_title, b_imag, b_author, b_publisher, b_pubdate, b_description, note_title, note_contents, pub_priv, joayo) VALUES( #{member_num}, #{member_name}, #{member_photo}, #{isbn}, #{b_title}, #{b_imag}, #{b_author}, #{b_publisher}, #{b_pubdate}, #{b_description}, #{note_title}, #{note_contents}, #{pub_priv}, #{joayo})
mapper.update: update booknotes set note_title = #{note_title}, note_contents = #{note_contents}, pub_priv = #{pub_priv} where note_id = #{note_id}
